title: Prototype Engin cranks could be CNC’d titanium, new seat collars go BBQ Black
content:
Engin’s CNC’d mountain bike stems are about to get a new friend with their upcoming fully machined crankset, plus more sizes and colors for their seatpost collars. The new cranks coming in Spring ’22, first in aluminum, but the end goal is titanium. But they’ll be really expensive, because they’ll take a really long time

The post Prototype Engin cranks could be CNC’d titanium, new seat collars go BBQ Black appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
